text:
LIVE: Mark Heywood is live in conversation with Prof Glenda Gray & Prof @ShabirMadh, 2 scientists leading the #Covid19 #vaccine research, to discuss SA's #Covid19 vaccine rollout.

Click here to listen to their discussion: https://t.co/H0aqpUxZ6g
